ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Lvl 31 Equipment Help
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Aaron Mattingly  To:  Sent: Wednesday, May 24, 2000 2:49 PM Subject: [EQ-Monks] Lvl 31 Equipment Help
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "Aaron Mattingly" <kistoga123@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 24, 2000 2:49 PM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Lvl 31 Equipment Help


> I need some suggestions on what equipment I should get. I can
> spend any amount of money. This is what I have now
>
> Earrings: +2 agi
> Neck: Black Pearl Choker
> Face: Sheer Bone Mask
> Head: EXE Hood
> Rings: Jagged Bands
> Wrist 1: Silver-plated Bracer
> Wrist 2: Erolissi Bracer
> Arms: Drake-Hide
> Gloves: Wu's Fighting Guntlets
> Shoulder: Tattered Mantle
> Chest: Foreman's Tunic
> Belt: Purple Sash of Order
> Legs: Feathered Leggings
> Feet: Kobold Hide Boots
>
> Also, whats a good place to lvl group or solo at lvl 31? Thanks in
> advance for the help.
>
> Thomm Spiritjumper
> 31 monk of mith marr
>
>
One thing I have noticed about EQ melee classes is that none of them are
dependant on anything besides strength, and as a monk, you want str at your
level because odds are you are not the tank. I made the mistake of putting
all my points into agility, and buying all agi stuff, i am level 20, but am
probably stopping the character because he has a massive disadvantage to
everyone else.

Earrings - Get str earrings
Neck - Plat sapphire necklace (7int 7str)
Face - Anything but sheer bone, that gives no usefull monk stats
Head - Looks Ok
Rings - Fire emerald rings
Wrist 1&2 - Fire emerald bracers (or Hero Bracers if you can afford)
Arms - Nothing came to mind
Gloves - Fine, might want treant fists, but not worth the time needed for
them
Shoulder - Lizardscale
Chest - Fine
Belt - Thick leather apron (or if you can afford, Thick banded belt)
Legs - Fine
Feet - Fine


There is no other place I would go at 31 than cazic thule, in feerot.
BTW, all my items is pure opinion, dont blindly follow this please, gets me
in trouble =)
